fields.short_description:
Access to gym. 
Access to all classess.
fields.full_description:
Access at any time within the opening hours. 
Gives access to all gym facilities and equipment. 
Access to all clases is also included (subject to availability). Pre-booking of classes is recommended due to limited number of spaces available.

fields.full_description:
Gives access to all gym facilities and equipment. 
Access to all clases is also included (subject to availability). Pre-booking of classes is recommended due to limited number of spaces available.

fields.short_description:
Access at any time within the opening hours. 
Access to gym. 
Access to all classess. 
Monthly personal training session and body assessment. 
Excersise tracking belt and phone app.
fields.full_description:
Gives access to all gym facilities and equipment. 
Access to all clases is also included (subject to availability). Pre-booking of classes is recommended due to limited number of spaces available. 
One monthly session with one of our personal trainers including body assessment. 
Hire of excercise tracking belt to monitor physical activity, heart rate, calories and time and duration of exercise. The phone app includes data review, built-in challenges and personal goals.
